snippet.title: Tiny Terraces Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out Tiny Terraces on Steam.

Tiny Terraces is a cozy idle farming game, watch tiny guys do tasks around the terrace, expand, progress, and decorate your Tiny Terrace.

Play The Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3289470/Tiny_Terraces_Demo/


#gamedevlopment #pixelart #vuvuu #shorts #gaming #indiegame #cozygames #wholesomegames
